name: Planet Golf
overview: In 1971 the Apollo 14 landed two men safely on the moon. Commander Alan Shepard spent more than 9 hours collecting lunar artifacts and performing several scientific experiments. And playing golf. 36940 years have passed since that day. Mankind has long colonized the entire solar system and space tourism is now a reality. Specially designed suits allow men to withstand the extreme conditions of open space and walk unharmed on other planets' surfaces. And play golf.
